turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello, Assistant. I would like for you to order me a coffee please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hello, sir. Where would you like your coffee from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like it from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, from the Starbucks located at 5101 Hinkleville Road Paducah Ky 42001?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, thats the one. The one located inside the mall.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That is in Paducah and you live in Murray, an hour away. Would you like me to wait a while before I order it to allow you time to get there.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, thank you. I had an appointment in Paducah and am on my way to the mall now. I just want it to be there ready for me. I hate standing in line.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Oh, ok. I totally understand. Those lines can take forever. What kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A friend was just telling me about the Iced Latte Macchiato. I would like to try that. He said it was really good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is that the one the commercial says This new espresso classic combines shots of espresso, whole milk and ice for a bold and roasty new way to sip?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes that is correct. But instead of whole milk I would like skim.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Those coffees do look delicious. I would be happy to get that ordered for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Terrific. I should be there in about 15 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, sir. What size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Get me the biggest they have got.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, they have the Grande which is 16 oz and a Venti Iced which is 24 oz.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Give me the Venti. I need a lot of caffeine today. Im a bit sleepy

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You've got it sir, would you like to add an extra shot of espresso to your coffee?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that would be great. I would also like frothy milk, cinnamon and 2 sugars.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, hold just a moment while I get that ordered for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok sir, you are all set. Your 24 oz Iced Latte Macchiato with skim, frothy milk, cinnamon and 2 sugars will be ready and waiting for you when you arrive at the store.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you so much Assistant. Do I need to pay when I get there?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You are more than welcome, sir. No, I have charged it to your debit card. It's will be waiting on the counter with your name on the cup when you get there. Just grab it and go.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You are incredible. I thank you so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You are welcome. I am glad to help and am here if you need me.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Good bye

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Goodbye
